short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort comments by votes or time.  It also opens the comments by default without having to click "Show Comments".

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort comments by votes or time. It also opens the comments by default without having to click "Show Comments".
